title: I got a chat restriction for calling someone a twat ?!?!?!?!?!
body:
plz riot fix this, calling someone "garbage" and "a twat" should not be punishable. But now my honor level has been reset and I have a 10 game chat restriction. I don't believe I am deserving of this and this should be reverted, all I was doing was giving a little competitive anger, nothing wrong in that.







Game 1
Pre-Game
Aggrivation: no :(
Aggrivation: yes
Aggrivation: ya
Aggrivation: all good
Aggrivation: im fine
In-Game
Aggrivation: lol ok gank
Aggrivation: im playing out of tilt
Aggrivation: LOL
Aggrivation: YES
Aggrivation: lol im not trolling
Aggrivation: but i am tilted from losing to a garb yas
Aggrivation: for what ?
Aggrivation: i just helped u get a kill and plates
Aggrivation: lol
Aggrivation: T_T
Aggrivation: its open
Aggrivation: theres no use
Aggrivation: i didnt quit
Aggrivation: its just good macro
Aggrivation: no i didnt
Aggrivation: just GOOD MACRO
Aggrivation: if u had it we wouldnt be where we r
Aggrivation: everyone gets tilted
Aggrivation: but u didnt jg correctly
Aggrivation: so we lose
Aggrivation: yes
Aggrivation: report me
Aggrivation: i did nothing wrong but plz report me
Aggrivation: wen its open that means ur a turret down
Aggrivation: flash R ?
Aggrivation: u must be faker
Aggrivation: cuz that was completely necessary u twat
Aggrivation: u still cant kill me solo so shush
Aggrivation: i rest my case
Aggrivation: garbage ADC's man..........
Aggrivation: lol ur so mad XD
Aggrivation: lol i still have the highest vision score
Aggrivation: cool
Aggrivation: lol yes
Aggrivation: do as the ADC GOD COMMANDS
Aggrivation: go bot
Aggrivation: do it

replies.body:
You can believe you weren't deserving of the chat restriction all you want, but insulting people (like calling them a "twat" or "garbage") does merit punishment.

Additionally, you had some other negativity-slash-sarcasm-slash-passive-agressiveness in your log.

> Aggrivation: but u didnt jg correctly
> Aggrivation: so we lose

Negativity...

> Aggrivation: flash R ?
> Aggrivation: u must be faker

Needless sarcasm...

> Aggrivation: do as the ADC GOD COMMANDS

Passive-aggressiveness.

All told, this behavior is punishment-worthy. Insults and flame get you nowhere, and being sarcastic and passive-aggressive with your teammates, similarly, does nothing to improve the situation.

As the old adage goes; "_If you can't say anything nice, then don't say anything at all._"

> ...it was nothing extravagant or wothy(sic) of being punished.

You aren't the judge of your behavior. Riot (and by extension, their IFS) is. Your behavior was deemed unsportsmanlike and over the line, hence you getting punished.

Well I'll point you to the jayce qoute to the left of the screen.  He's fine to debate whether or not his behavior warrants punishment.  This is partly what these forums are for.  We are the judges of our behavior, Riot bans people for toxic behavior because they think the majority of players are onboard with that.  And tbh, I don't think this merits a report.  It's mild.  They were bickering.  Thats it.  I would just say mute annoying players dont debate them.  I'm one of the ones who think bans and suspensions are too much and chat restrictions are borderline too much.  We could mute one another, turn the other cheek, be the bigger person.  Rather than angrily check report boxes out of revenge.  Though thats my opinion like that calling someone a twat being a punishable offence is an opinion.  Both deserve equal respect everyone believes different things and its better to be tactful and respectful.  But Ill just ignore someone if theyre a dick to me.  Like one time back in highschool this kid said "you have a very punchable face to me" while hanging out with me and my friends.  So I didn't say anything just gave him a funny look and walked away as all my friends followed me.  Needless to say he had upmost respect for me then.  I don't believe in punishment over words only leading by example and turning the other cheek.

Don't be toxic then. Got nothing nice to say?
